ygData.subject: RE: Gypsy Lute?
ygData.msgSnippet: It looks like some tests are warranted on the new gypsy lute before it gets turned in for the quest to see if it enhances songs that use the lute.  Lets hope
ygData.messageBody:
It looks like some tests are warranted on the new gypsy lute before it gets
turned in for the quest to see if it enhances songs that use the lute. Lets
hope the tests come out positive. Would be nice, although highly unlikely,
if that +5 magic resist that the gypsy lute gives is given to all party
members when the lute is played.

Galtin of E'ci

> So it appears there is a Lute of the Gypsy Princess and now a Gypsy Lute.
> The screenshot of the gypsy lute says +5 Sv Magic which makes me want one
> simply for that fact. I'd be curious if anyone gets their hands on this,
> if maybe this is the equal to the Mistmoore Battle drum (I know this is
> probably just a fantasy. . . but hey, this is a fantasy game huh? =).
>
>
